website_summaries.verdict: A colorful but distinctive look in cotton.
pros: Offers a lot of color for a dull space
Sturdy material with bright, vibrant colors
Also works great as curtains or a throw
cons: Colors might be less vibrant than the online pictures

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any room
customer_reviews.text: Using in place of curtains in my sun room for privacy as well as decor. It is light enough to allow air flow through screens as well as keeping direct sun from blinding us or cause the room to be to warm. When you open package there is a strong odor from dye chemicals used. I hung 4 panels and had to air out the room. But the odor has dissipated or I have become nose blind. I could wash them but wanted to decorate with them as soon as they arrived!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made Tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful 100% cotton tapestry. The colors do look brighter on screen, but I’m not unhappy. It’s still a beautiful piece. People saying it was small maybe ordered the wrong size? Mine is huge 85” x 80”. Can’t beat it for 15 bucks. The last photo is post washing in cold and drying on delicate. Colors held fast, and the measurements were taken after washing as well. It has a typical tapestry smell. If you’ve ever bought a legit cotton tapestry you know what I’m talking about. I’ll probably buy more. This is going camping with me and then on a wall. Would be great as a base layer for the beach. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Geeja

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The first photo shown is the advertised color. The second photo is the actual color. Though I was disappointed in the lack of vibrancy I was expecting I decided that they were still pretty so I kept them. I purchased three of the large size and used them on banquet sized tables as tablecloths for a Moroccan Community “Take-out” dinner. The fabric is light weight, the color is nicely saturated and the quality was good for the price. I read many reports about the cloth having an odor. These did not have an odor at all and could be used straight out of the packaging. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: french in time

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric. Seems durable. Deep colors. Doesn't look like photo.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a few wall hangings. This looks so different from the photo that I thought that they had mistakenly left one out of the order. It was my mistake. The orange doesn't cover as much of the material as it does in the photo, and the area in the middle takes up a lot more room on the garment. The fabric is really nice. Tightly woven, durable. Deep colors. I don't see this fading when washed. I only wish it resembled the photo with the orange color covering more territory.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a door-size window that connects my room to the sunroom in the back of our house. I couldn't handle the amount of light coming in without anything up, but I hated how dark and stuffy it felt with a black-out curtain. Given my profoundly hippie nature, I went looking for something to let just enough light in, while still ensuring my privacy and matching the appeal of my room. I couldn't be more pleased with how well this tapestry fills those needs! Absolutely gorgeous, and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors. Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors. Nice size. I have a king size bed and it is as big as my headboard. Fabric seems durable. Really enjoying this addition to my room!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: BITCHEN COOL!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE this pattern! I bought 2 to hang outdoors in my gazebo, along with some other patterned hangings, so I could bring back those 70’s vibes that are so popular now. The colors are bright & they really pop! I washed them in cold water, let them air dry outside; easy peasy, ready to hang. And they look really groovy, just like I had imagined. If you’re into the hippie/boho thang, get yourself a couple of these & see if you’re diggin’ them as much as I am!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B.

customer_reviews.title: Color is dark not bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this three years ago, the one that I have received today. It’s extremely dull the colors are not vibrant at all they are very dark. They look nothing like the picture unfortunately. So if you’re going based on color I would not recommend this product. It is very very dark
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Colors and designs may vary from the photo listed on Amazon for this product.
customer_reviews.text: The cloth is in good quality but the colors in my cloth I received are different than the photo on the Amazon listing. Colors and the width of each circle in the cloth just seem off or different than the one displayed on the listing online. I like the photo better than the actual product I received so I’m not as happy as I should have been with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Remember the old adage..?
customer_reviews.text: I will start with the good first: the colours are vibrant, it is lightweight, true to size, and inexpensive. The old adage that you get what you pay for, is apropos. While the above is true, I expected that the fabric would be a little less coarse, and the colours would not seem as if they were bleeding together.
customer_reviews.author: BellaMorena36

customer_reviews.title: Pretty big but can hang by myself! LOVE this tapestry!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this tapestry, I have two! I’ve used them in every dorm/house I’ve lived in since 2015! They are a great material, hand super well, and so pretty! They are pretty large but I’ve always been able to hang it up myself!
customer_reviews.author: Helena Jones

customer_reviews.title: It really does smell that bad
customer_reviews.text: The smell is horrible! I tried to hang it in my house to air out, but it was too strong for the house. I put it on my back porch to air out, and the smell was still so strong that I couldn’t stand to be OUTSIDE with it. It’s now on my rarely used front porch. It’s been there for about a week. It still stinks. I’ve sprayed it multiple times with odor eliminating spray. I’m trying to decide if I’ll ever be able to hang it in my house. It’s a very musty smell. Like it’s been in someone’s mildewed basement for 20 years. So gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The quality and texture of the material was way more beautiful than I was expecting. Nice thick and easy to hang. I am using it for a pop up tent wall.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: My daughter picked this out for one of her birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this out for one of her birthday presents. She said she likes the colors and design but I suspect she's using it to cover the escape tunnel she has been digging.
customer_reviews.author: nozama

customer_reviews.title: Not True to The Colors of the photos!!
customer_reviews.text: The Colors Are NOTHING like the Photo! And It was Bought cause of the colors! This is very disappointing... The Smell is Awful! Its Pretty Yes But I wanted the Colors I ordered! Amazon seems to be getting worse everyday! So Sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Blondebritt24

customer_reviews.title: If you’re thinking about buying this DO IT!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars all the way! I didn’t write a review sooner because I wanted to see how it would hold up, I’ve had this since 2015 and the colors are still vibrant and beautiful. It’s much bigger than I thought it would be, there was a smell when we opened the package but it’s looooong gone. It’s very well made and it’s something you’d see in earth bound or urban outfitters for about $50 or $60 so this was definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not as pictured, but still nice
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a product wherein you get what you paid for. This tapestry might not be high enough quality to use for multiple outdoor picnics, but it makes great home decor. My only issue is that the colors are much more muted than the product photo shows. All in all, it's a great product for the price. I just wish the seller was more transparent in its depictions of the product.
customer_reviews.author: kiana

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE TO COLOR SHOWN
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read reviews before purchasing this "purple" tapestry. It is definitely not the same coloring as what is shown in sellers pictures. As others stated it's not terrible, just not vibrant at all. There is also a very strong chemical odor.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Dinardo

customer_reviews.title: As beautiful as many of these Indian hangings are, I'm amazed at how cheap they are to buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. Colorful but not dayglow. These Indian hangings are useful for many things. A big one like this passes as a bed cover, it makes a nice wall hanging, easy to put up temporarily for shade on the patio or while camping. I personally like the mandala pattern for focus meditation. I haven't had to wash this one yet so I don't know how it will stand up, but it looks like it will do okay if gentle washed and hung to air dry. As beautiful as many of these Indian hangings are, I'm amazed at how cheap they are to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B Gale

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself a couple years ago - my adult son asked me if he could have it to decorate his new apartment/ I told him no - and I bought him the exact one for his birthday - he was very surprised and happy - it's hard to please an adult child sometimes- this time, I did. This product is colorful bright, and light enough to hang on a wall/
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive advertising.
customer_reviews.text: I have mine away the day it came. It was SO dark and looked nothing like the picture,which beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Engel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I haven't figured out what I'm going to do with this beauty yet. I actually bought the small one (because the price was so great) just to check quality. I am very happy with this piece and hope to return to buy the bigger pieces as soon as I figure out which ones I need.
customer_reviews.author: Plumfield

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Morrocan themed party and used this to sit on. Very thin material so we had to put mats underneath for comfort. Received so many compliments on it, many thought it was authentic. definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: @ $7 u get what u pay 4
customer_reviews.text: Just disappointed. Material is thin, smelly. Measurements are off. Colors are off. Design is off. I guess for $7, I got what I paid for. Still, I won't buy this again. I've never seen one this small.
customer_reviews.author: aMUSEd

customer_reviews.title: not square like the picture but rectangle and wildly different colors
customer_reviews.text: not sure why people put pictures up that are not what is sold, this picture is gorgeous and huge. The actual tapestry is small, smaller than half the picture, not square like the picture but rectangle and wildly different colors. Upon opening I found it was dark, almost black and not bright at all. To bad the one in the picture doesn't exist I would love to have it!
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, last delivery driver
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing, however the UPS driver delivered it with the box crushed and split wide open as if someone cut the security tape with a knife all the way. Driver didn’t even bother adding a strip of tape to seal the box back up. I have pictures of the box but it won’t let me upload.
customer_reviews.author: Celtic Hutcheson

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to hang this in my new house! I was looking for something bold to hang as a centerpiece but I'm thinking about ordering a few more and using them as curtains!
customer_reviews.author: tamerajryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good tapestry. Easy to dry the wrinkles out, smells strong of plastic but I'm just hanging it up so it didnt bother me or overwhelm the small room. It was slightly smaller than expected but that's my bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Allen

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors are just beautiful in this tapestry. I bought two and use them for table cloths. Slightly fading colors after many washes. I am buying two more again!
customer_reviews.author: SellnMelln

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was the very first product I ever ordered from Amazon and I loved it. I first used it as decoration but grew out of it and ended up using as a blanket for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easily ripped
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's about what I expected, the tapestry is lightweight and looks good! It is darker than the images but still looks great and is what I expected. Only issue is that I've had it on my wall about three weeks and it has already ripped through the pins three times, the fabric is thin and rips easily. Other than that I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: I love Mandala's.
customer_reviews.text: I love Mandala's... use them in different ways all over my house... This is wrong, false advertiment!! Not as vibrant as the picture... it's actually darker and duller then others I have👎🏻👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Kringlers

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, Great Fabric, Great Colors
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful boho couch cover, very large. I bought several different types. This one is by far the biggest size and best fabric. Very brilliant colors.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Looks exactly like the picture, colors are vibrant and detailed! I made it into a curtain for our patio door and when I took it to the fabric store while it was on the measuring table all the ladies in the store were admiring it and asking where I found it. It is rather thin, so I ended up ordering another one to make a double sided curtain so the sun won't fade it as quickly. Also, both sides of the tapestry are very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: ColeyJonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I needed a little something to soften my meditation corner and this was perfect. The colors are beautiful and the quality is exactly as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Bluskyz

customer_reviews.title: Lovely colors and pattern
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light tapestry, can be used as bedspread, table cover, picnic blanket, or on furniture for sunbathing
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Sosna

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful just kinda dark. Easy to put up, smells a little funky when you get it so I definitely recommend washing it first. Easy to fold up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Belle

customer_reviews.title: Festive and Unique
customer_reviews.text: This item was too thin for my original purpose but turned out well as a tablecloth for an Arabian nights-themed party.
customer_reviews.author: MR19

customer_reviews.title: The colors were nothing at all like pictured, I think if the colors had at ...
customer_reviews.text: very very thin, very very disappointing! The colors were nothing at all like pictured, I think if the colors had at least been true to what is shown I would have kept it despite it being so thin. I wouldn't recommend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: dawnt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Lightweight yet strudu enough. Colors off but beautiful all the same. It works for me. Good price. I would buy from this seller again
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Daydreams 😎😉✌💕

customer_reviews.title: Rich colorful tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Love the rich colors. This is the second time purchasing this tapestry I love it so much. Personally the colors are reflected fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne & Steve

customer_reviews.title: love the look and bright colors
customer_reviews.text: love the look and bright colors ... one star off just because it comes with a "new" smell that I do not like at all, and the other tapestries I bought at the same time don't smell bad at all but this on does ... sprayed it with febreez and it helped a little. Having to leave the window open and fan on in the winter of the freezing Colorado weather ... so, yes, that's annoying, but it's lovely nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: PEY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Completely misleading. Colors are different, half the size I expected from the advertisement and had a strange odor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a pop of color to add to my room and this definitely did the trick! It’s so beautiful and helps me feel calm. It’s very thin which makes it easy to hang up. The only issue I came across was some loose strings on the edges but since I won’t be washing it too often, I am not concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssandra Suddath

customer_reviews.title: Colors not good
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the photo, this fabric was dull and muddy looking.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, colorful fabric!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these tapestries and I love them! They're so colorful and pretty. I have them draped over a stairwell railing and they look great. Definitely a nice product for a reasonable price and would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: STUNNING AND BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Omg this tapestry is so amazing!!! I just received it and the colors are so vibrant!! The design enhances any room in the most beautiful and artistic way. When hanging it up, some of the dye rubbed off onto my fingers but it was easily washable with warm water and soap. I would highly recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cool tapestry. Good material and worth the price. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan PB Feuer

customer_reviews.title: Trippy Hippy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the smaller style tapestry. It's perfect for a picnic, or to throw over a chair for decorative purposes. The description photo is more bright than the actual tapestry which is more dark colored unfortunately, but it's still nice looking. I would definitely purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: mallisa

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviewers that said the colors are way off. In the picture it is vibrant and nicely contrasted. In reality, the colors are dark and nothing really pops out. The hem was not of good quality, either. I was happy that it did not have a bad smell.
customer_reviews.author: patsly

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photos, but overall okay
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is very thin, feels cheaply made. Then again, it wasn't very expensive, the price was great. As far as the colors, they matched the patterns in the picture, but the actual one I received is a lot darker. It is also only printed on one side, which makes the non printed side look very dull and dim. It's a nice size, and has held up well. I am content with it, wouldn't buy again, and probably wouldn't recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Alex Reed White

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: i really love this! yes it is thin type material but not really what i would call cheap either. i mean how thick do you need to fabric? i have two different one like this bought on different occasion and they are the same quality. no issues. very beautiful. i actually use this as a cover for our gaming table.
customer_reviews.author: anjiestar

customer_reviews.title: Great Colors and Design
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make a canopy over my Granddaughter’s Crib. The theme was Maharaji Indian Princess 👸🏽 🐘 it came out beautifully. I used 4 joined together around an oval hoop suspended from the ceiling to enclose the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, completely transforms a room!
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS tapestry, terrific colors and artistry, covers my daughter's entire bedroom wall and fills it with color. She loves it and so do I! Fantastic price for such a lovely piece of hanging art that can transform a room!
customer_reviews.author: TBS

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my wall and it looks much better than a headboard
customer_reviews.author: Zen Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging at festivals.
customer_reviews.text: Love this tapestry. Great to hang on canopy at festivals because the tapestry has an image on both side.
customer_reviews.author: Tinapcola

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: I felt like the picture made it look broght and vibrant. Well when i got it was very dull. Kind of disappointed. Is it even the same one?
customer_reviews.author: Melanin Berry 🍓

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: It’s brightly colored and beautiful. As other reviewers have said, hem slightly uneven and there was a small spot that appeared to have some dirt on it but overall a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Haley D

customer_reviews.title: Longjevity
customer_reviews.text: My couch is solid purple ... and velvet! This is a great cover . Second one I’ve had . First one faded but still looked good after 2 years . New one great but old one now designated for trips to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: nice tapestry
customer_reviews.text: great size and the colors are pretty. i think if the colors were more vintage or dulled down it would look even cooler but still a great tapestry.
customer_reviews.author: sadie repinski

customer_reviews.title: Great price fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Last of the tapestries for upstairs gives room special lightness and good vibe
customer_reviews.author: Shawna lamar

customer_reviews.title: Nice.  But dull colors
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy 👍🏾 but the colors are dull still nice though
customer_reviews.author: Terriah Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Item!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was awesome! So glad I picked this item. It was not super thin and the fabric is gorgeous. It is also HUGE. Great value for the price! I purchased the queen size tapestry. I have a queen sized bed that I pinned it above. I am so in love with this item.
customer_reviews.author: BlackQueen92

customer_reviews.title: Nice print
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern rich in color and fun hung up over my stairs looks ggod
customer_reviews.author: lanae

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by the quality of material. Could be used as a bed SHEET, or simply bed decor. Used mine as wall tapestry. Gotten several compliments. Washed on normal cycle with cool water; colors didn’t run. Withstood the wash and dryer. I like it. Would make a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: FredaBonita

customer_reviews.title: beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a bedcover/ spread. It's a bit small and does not cover a twin bed completely- head to foot or down the sides.It is beautiful though. Vibrant colors purple,magenta,blue and gold. I'm sure it would make a nice wall decoration also. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MD in NJ

customer_reviews.title: colors not as vibrant as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The tapestry is ok. I would have loved for them to be thicker. The color of this one is not as advertised. even my picture makes it look much brighter than it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful addition to my “Zen Den”. Allow a couple of days for it to air our prior to hanging. It arrives with a a strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: For the price....wow
customer_reviews.text: As described. Exactly what was needed to inspire the space. Great colors. Extremely happy. Ordering a second design. Well worth the $12.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani D Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Note: As it says, this tapestry is twin sized. I missed that when I made my order, and it was too small for what I had intended to do with it. No worries, I have new plans for it now. It's beautiful and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Russell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece, great value
customer_reviews.text: This remind us of the beautiful tapestries we used to buy at Venice Beach, CA. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Steven Funk, Ed.D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Bohemian Summer
customer_reviews.text: Building a canopy on my balcony and bought these. Who the quality and colors are outstanding! Great value for you money. I am going to buys a few more...
customer_reviews.author: H.B. Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: It is prettier than the picture. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are vibrant and perfect. The quality is spot on. Iam using it for a table cloth and it is just the right size. It is very pretty and it is perfect for what I had in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Tenbrook

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the photo. Great colors. Crisp, but softens as you wash it (I dry it in the dryer, too). Bought one for me, and now 2 more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this originally for me, but I ended up giving it to my sister. She absolutely loves it and had it on her wall! very durable and the colours are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: ereripancake

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great decoration piece. Very light weight and material is all cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Sukhpreet

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but small and smelly
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I thought. Smelled bad but is pretty
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY MISLEADING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't even give this a one star. It isn't even half the size it states it is also it looks nothing like the picture. When I received it the smell was so strong it was making my head hurt. I would never buy this again or recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful Tapestry. I had no idea that Amazon sold these and cannot wait to up my collection now I know what I'm going to be buying people for Christmas and birthday presents. It came very fast and actually came within two days and arrive exactly how I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty!!! Thin but not cheap. Colors Re vibrant. Quick shipping. I'll be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I got a few to hang up in my cubby hole bedroom in my travel trailer
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: It looks great! Colors are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I'm an interior decorator and my teen client wanted one of these hung in place of a closet door. I was skeptical...thought it would look cheap. It looks great! Colors are beautiful, good quality, and really adds interest to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Winsor

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice tapestry but does not look quite like the picture it’s much darker and smaller than expected but over all still nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Whitman

customer_reviews.title: Good price and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a table covering for a table at a festival. It was beautiful and I got so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The material is a bit thinner than I was expecting. Also there were some loose threads which clearly indicates lazy quality control. But all in all it's really cool. The two sides are similar. One side just has a darker color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Different color than pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bright colored back drop. This is cute, but WAY darker than what I wanted. Not to happy :(
customer_reviews.author: Reyna Flores

customer_reviews.title: dull
customer_reviews.text: obviously the colors aren’t as vibrant as the pictures. bc the pictures they used are edited. but it’s the right size, and idk i don’t think it looks horrible. but definitely not as pretty as i thought. it’s a bit dull.
customer_reviews.author: katie taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had read previous reviews saying that they were not happy or did not receive this product the way it looked, but I figured why not. It was a good price and the other ones looked cool as well. I have to say I do not regret buying this at all, it came in earlier than expected, and it came exactly like the picture! Very happy with this buy and would buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: jibjab3040

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and looked in the photos! I bought 4 of them and they were all great light weight enough to hang on the ceiling of our basement... let them air out they do have a strong smell but other than that they are beautiful and a bargain at the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts of all ages & multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: Great for gifts of all ages & multiple uses. Be creative. Wash great on cold & I dried to set colors. Use to cover my wet clothes on hangers,draped over a rod. They've been colorfast after dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Garten

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Love this tapestry its 2 sided. Same design a true tapestry. Not a silky material more cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting this to be as good quality as it is! It came bigger than I expected, and I love the colors so much! I recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie W.

customer_reviews.title: This tapestry is so beautiful, and it looks perfect on my wall
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is so beautiful, and it looks perfect on my wall. The colors are slightly darker than the picture shows, but I don't mind. Will be buying more tapestries like this one. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Torn but using anyway.
customer_reviews.text: Item was torn and had a gaping hole. Wasn't worth the returning to seller. I kept it and just used duct tape. I never got hold of the seller. I am sure things would have been made right. But I am not one of those consumers. One and done for me!! I liked the colors and print though!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, washed well and was a colorful.addition to our party decor.
customer_reviews.author: H.Holliday

customer_reviews.title: ... the picture that i would be getting a square like mandala, but it is not square it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression by the picture that i would be getting a square like mandala, but it is not square it is rectangular. Very long one way, Short the other way. Also smells old like an attic. Pretty coloring though and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: A few loose threads, but still worth it.
customer_reviews.text: There are a few loose threads around the edge, and it seems like it got caught a little in the middle so there’s a loose thread there, but other then that it looks very nice. I can’t wait to give it as a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Mica G

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tapestry. Its the perfect size to put over my window. The colors are a little bit darker then in the photos but still vibrant and the print is very clean. It is a thinner material which was perfect for letting natural light through my window but some may want to block light. If so this will be too thin for you.
customer_reviews.author: Haillee Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong design
customer_reviews.text: The design is not the same as what is pictured. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: andrea fiala

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so vivid! This is lovely and looks great hanging as my headboard. Good size, and the cloth is light but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthyn

product_meta.title: Marubhumi Hippy Mandala Bohemian Tapestries, Indian Dorm Decor, Psychedelic Tapestry Wall Hanging Ethnic Decorative Tapestry (85 x 55 Inches, Purple Multi)
product_meta.description: Size:85x55 inch| Color:Purple MultiThis gorgeous piece of art can be used as Bedspread, Bed Cover, Table Cloth, Curtain and of course as a Tapestry or a Wall Hanging.This Tapestries are completely screen printed in traditional Indian method and takes around a week to complete. These tapestries are printed, not quilted or woven. Each tapestry has its unique imperfections. In some cases what printers would call registration errors are intentionally included on the screen print to simulate hand woodblock prints. Because of the unique and handmade nature the measurements above may differ a small bit from the real one. Actual colors may slightly vary from those shown due to the nature of photographing and monitor color settings.
feature_bullets: Fabric: 100% Cotton Fabric, Screen Printed Design.
Perfect for Gift - A Beautiful Home Decor Piece, Makes a Great Gift, Beautiful Wall Hanging, Dorm Divider , Beach Cover Up , Bedsheet
CARE: Dry Cleaning Or Cold Water Wash
100% cotton made Colorful screen printed cotton bed sheet, tapestry, throw or wall hanging
